data.title: Art and Then Some
data.text:
A fun visit.  See exceptionally good artwork , 2 and 3 dimensional, displayed in several rooms in a converted bank bldg.  There are also active artists working in separate studios and a well stocked shop where one can purchase hand made jewelry as well as the displayed artwork.  A fun visit for anyone who enjoys a variety of art experience.
The only problem is the afternoon only hours.  It would help to have AM time available.

data.title: Local artist
data.text: Drop by and see what the area has to offer by local artist.  Some is fine art, some folk,but all fun. Visit the gift shop for a special gift for a friend or a souvenir of your visit

data.title: Nice art gallery and shop in Gastonia
data.text: Arts on Main is a lovely gallery with local artists of all medias in downtown Gastonia.  Often some of the artists are in the gallery demonstrating their work.  They also have a nice shop great for gifts or home decor.

data.title: Local Artisans, Different Media
data.text: Went here with my better half and talked to a couple of local artists who had studios there. We did buy some jewelry and enjoyed our brief tour there.

data.title: Great place to local art
data.text: If your into local art and artist then this is a must do. Cool place where you can meet the artist, get your purchase signed and see many unique arts forms.

data.title: Special needs artists
data.text: It is great to see support of our special needs artists.  The art does not suit our décor, but we enjoy visiting the gallery.  We got the chance to meet a few of the artists.

data.title: Very exciting - all of us should want to support this!
data.text: What a wonderful project - the Town has shown great wisdom supporting Arts on Main.   It is the Arts and Humanities which makes a culture rich.   Arts on Main brings together visual and textural artists tied together with the occasional musical and theatrical events.   We go to their monthly openings and many of their other events... the skills of our local artists are truly exceptional

data.title: Wonderful variety and quality of work
data.text: The quality of artwork exhibited at Arts on Main is excellent, with a good variety of media represented, as well.  The gift store offers choices in a wide range of selections at very reasonable cost.  What a great place to find unique gifts!
